major: Textiles, Merchandising & Fashion Design: Textile & Apparel Design

Textile & Apparel Design.1: Communicate ideas clearly and effectively in oral, visual and written forms.
Textile & Apparel Design.2: Apply processes and theories to solve problems in the textiles and apparel product lifecycles.
Textile & Apparel Design.3: Analyze and synthesize the cultural, behavioral, historical and aesthetic dimensions of the global textiles and apparel industry.
Textile & Apparel Design.4: Demonstrate ability to work effectively in group decision making contexts.
Textile & Apparel Design.5: Use technologies relevant to research, product development and innovation in the soft goods industry.
